response.original_title: Un autre monde, la story de Téléphone
response.overview: Back on the history of the famous rock band, composed of Louis Bertignac, Corine Marienneau, Richard Kolinka and Jean-Louis Aubert.  Formed in November 1976, Téléphone announced his separation less than ten years later, in April 1986. Meanwhile, it marked the French music with hits like "Ca c'est vraiment toi" and "New York avec toi"  Childhood friend of Louis Bertignac, Lionel Lumbroso evokes memories, especially alongside Dominique Forestier, sound engineer on the album "Un autre monde", from Jean-Marie Perier photographer who produced the documentary film "Téléphone Public" and publisher Patrick Zelnik.
response.title: Un autre monde, la story de Téléphone
